wikipedia_page.main: Ian Paul Richardson (born 9 May 1964) is an English footballer, who played as a forward in the Football League for Watford, Blackpool, Rotherham United, Chester City and Scunthorpe United.

response: Ian Richardson (1934 – 2007) was a Scottish actor.
Ian Richardson may also refer to:
*Ian Richardson (Australian footballer) (born 1987), Australian rules football player
*Ian Richardson (footballer, born 1970), English football (soccer) player and manager
